FuncDef: The display device elabel command displays the electronic label of the device. The display device elabel command displays the electronic label of the device.
CLIs: display device elabel [ slot <slotid> [ card <cardid> ] [ brief ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 30 characters.

Specifies a card ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 characters.

Indicates that the electronic label of a device does not include interface information.
-
